text: ItWasntEnough is the eighth extended play by American rapper, XXXTentacion. ItWasntEnough was first released on March 18, 2016 on X's SoundCloud. It was later re-released posthumously through Columbia on September 8, 2023 for streaming services. The EP is a short version of a mixtape called ItWillAllBeOverSoon but the original was unfinished and cancelled. On September 5, 2023, the album was announced by X's estate on his Instagram along with the tracklisting and release date. On ItWasntEnough, X raps and sings about topics like depression, suicide, and regrets for the things he has done. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2023 albums Category:XXXTentacion albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: ItWasntEnough
